name: part_010
file: tmp_大神ミオ４周年記念ライブ - Mio Forest night party - [0WLlmgirGD8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Ookami Mio talks to her fans (Mio-fa) about their 3D models and upcoming performance.
Ookami Mio performs her original song 'Sayonara wa, mada'.

subtitles.original: なんか手がすごい短くてサイリウムがめちゃくちゃ振りにくそうなんだけれどもね
subtitles.english: Your hands are so short, it looks like it's really hard to wave those penlights...

subtitles.original: みんな頑張ってね、あの、サイリウムではなく自分が揺れることでね、応援してくれてますね
subtitles.english: Everyone is doing their best, cheering me on by swaying themselves instead of the penlights.

subtitles.original: かわいい！
subtitles.english: So cute!

subtitles.original: けど後ろから見るとなんか灰色の草が揺れてるみたいだなぁ
subtitles.english: But from the back, it looks like grey grass is swaying...

subtitles.original: すごいかわいい。ちょっと後でね、
subtitles.english: Very cute. A bit later,

subtitles.original: モフったりとかしたいんですけれども、君たち立体化したんだねー
subtitles.english: I want to fluff you all, you've all become 3D!

subtitles.original: はい、というわけでちょっと新しいものが多すぎて、なんか全然追いつかないんですけれども
subtitles.english: Yes, well, there are so many new things that I can't keep up with them all.

subtitles.original: ま、いっぱい用意してくれた運営さん本当にありがとうございました。ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Anyway, thank you so much to the staff for preparing all of this. Thank you.

subtitles.original: さて、えー、まだまだちょっとライブは続くんですけれども、次ちょっとそろそろ行こうかなーと思います
subtitles.english: Now then, the live is still going on, and I think it's about time to move on to the next one.

subtitles.original: なんかみんな気づいてる？
subtitles.english: Is everyone noticing?

subtitles.original: あの、ついこの間うちオリジナル曲出したよね。
subtitles.english: You know, I just released an original song the other day.

subtitles.original: それまだ聞いてないなって思うよね。
subtitles.english: I'm thinking I haven't heard that yet.

subtitles.original: うんうん。ちょっと準備してくるから。あははは。
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah. I'm going to go get ready. Hahaha.

subtitles.original: じゃあちょっと準備してきますね。みんな楽しみにしてて、
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll go get ready. Everyone look forward to it,

subtitles.original: 最後まで絶対見てね！いってきます！
subtitles.english: and be sure to watch until the very end! Here I go!

subtitles.original: ネオンライトは眩く
subtitles.english: Neon lights are dazzling

subtitles.original: 街灯明滅 通り過ぎ
subtitles.english: Passing by the blinking streetlights

subtitles.original: 窓の向こう 夜の風に
subtitles.english: Beyond the window, in the night wind

subtitles.original: 空を見た
subtitles.english: I looked at the sky

subtitles.original:
サヨナラは、まだ
作詞・作曲: 河合泰志, 山本恭平 (Arte Refact)
編曲: 河合泰志, 山本恭平, 脇眞富 (Arte Refact)
subtitles.english:
"Goodbye is not yet"
Lyrics & Composition: Taishi Kawai, Kyohei Yamamoto (Arte Refact)
Arrangement: Taishi Kawai, Kyohei Yamamoto, Masatomi Waki (Arte Refact)

subtitles.original: 忙しない足取り
subtitles.english: Hectic footsteps

subtitles.original: まばらなノイズ
subtitles.english: Sparse noise

subtitles.original: 私だけが 取り残されたようで
subtitles.english: As if I'm the only one left behind

subtitles.original: ゆめうつつ
subtitles.english: In a half-awake dream

subtitles.original: また光に揺られる
subtitles.english: Swayed by the light again

subtitles.original: 心の中で私を消して
subtitles.english: Erasing myself within my heart

subtitles.original: 追いかけた過去 背中合わせの
subtitles.english: The past I chased, back-to-back

subtitles.original: 希望 密度 押しつぶされぬよう
subtitles.english: So that hope and density won't crush me

subtitles.original: だから君と ここにいる時間は
subtitles.english: That's why the time I spend here with you

subtitles.original: せめて
subtitles.english: At least

subtitles.original: 言葉にできず 見つめ合うだけ
subtitles.english: Just staring at each other, unable to put it into words

subtitles.original: 思考回路 ぼやけたままで さあ
subtitles.english: With my thought process remaining blurred, now

subtitles.original: 光を掴むまで
subtitles.english: Until I grasp the light

subtitles.original: サヨナラは、まだ
subtitles.english: Goodbye is not yet

subtitles.original: 暗いカーテン 向こうの
subtitles.english: Beyond the dark curtains

subtitles.original: 偏光反射 籠の鳥
subtitles.english: Polarized reflections, a bird in a cage

subtitles.original: 閉じた心 隠したくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to hide my closed heart

subtitles.original: ふと一人
subtitles.english: Suddenly alone

subtitles.original: また光に溺れる
subtitles.english: Drowning in the light again

subtitles.original: 呼吸する暇もなくて 沈む
subtitles.english: Sinking without even a moment to breathe

subtitles.original: 時の狭間で 隣り合わせの
subtitles.english: Side by side in the gap of time

subtitles.original: 理想 現実 押しつぶされぬよう
subtitles.english: So that ideals and reality won't crush me

subtitles.original: だから私 繋がっていたいの
subtitles.english: That's why I want to be connected

subtitles.original: 君と
subtitles.english: With you

subtitles.original: 見つめ合うたび 微笑み合って
subtitles.english: Smiling at each other every time our eyes meet

subtitles.original: だけど君は ぼやけたままでさ
subtitles.english: But you remain blurred

subtitles.original: 巡り すれ違って
subtitles.english: Coming across each other, passing by each other

subtitles.original: 惹かれ合う また
subtitles.english: Attracted to each other once again

subtitles.original: (Endless Night, Endless Light)
subtitles.english: (Endless Night, Endless Light)

subtitles.original: (Inner the Cage, Outside the Cage)
subtitles.english: (Inner the Cage, Outside the Cage)

subtitles.original: 逃げ出してみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try running away

subtitles.original: (This story will end, though)
subtitles.english: (This story will end, though)

subtitles.original: 心 離れずに溺れ...
subtitles.english: Drowning without letting go of my heart...

subtitles.original: 未来に魅入られる
subtitles.english: Enchanted by the future

subtitles.original: 夢の中なら私と きっと
subtitles.english: In a dream, with me, surely

subtitles.original: 追いかけた過去 背中合わせの
subtitles.english: The past I chased, back-to-back

subtitles.original: 希望 密度 押しつぶされぬよう
subtitles.english: So that hope and density won't crush me

subtitles.original: だから君と ここにいる時間は
subtitles.english: That's why the time I spend here with you

subtitles.original: せめて
subtitles.english: At least

subtitles.original: 言葉にできず 見つめ合うだけ
subtitles.english: Just staring at each other, unable to put it into words

subtitles.original: 思考回路 ぼやけたままで さあ
subtitles.english: With my thought process remaining blurred, now

subtitles.original: 光を掴むまで
subtitles.english: Until I grasp the light

subtitles.original: サヨナラは、まだ
subtitles.english: Goodbye is not yet
